name: LeftHome
description:
A survival game inspired on the Home Alone movie series. 2 bandits invaded your home, and you (the kid)need to show those no-good bandits they cant mess around! Craft traps from household items and use them against the bandits to take them down. 

Credits:
Art, Design, Music credits MV.

Art, Code and Design: Ruddy.

github repo is open source https://github.com/Rodolfo377/GBComp_21
